name: Munchy's Lexus Chocolate Cream Sandwich Cracker
description:
Munchy's Lexus Chocolate Cream Sandwich Cracker is a delightful snack that combines the crunchiness of crackers with the smoothness of chocolate cream. Each sandwich is made with two crisp crackers filled with luscious chocolate cream, providing a perfect balance of savory and sweet flavors. Ideal for snacking, sharing, or enjoying tea or coffee, these crackers are a treat for all ages. Ingredients: Wheat Flour, Sugar, Palm Oil, Cocoa Powder, Chocolate Cream Filling (contains sugar, cocoa butter, milk powder), Baking Powder, Emulsifiers (e.g., lecithin), Salt, Vanilla Extract, Artificial Flavors and Colors, Preservatives (for freshness). Snack: Perfect for enjoying on its own during a break or as a quick snack.Tea/Coffee Time: Great for pairing with your favorite beverage for a delightful snack.Picnics & Parties: A convenient and delicious treat to bring along to share with others.Gift: Makes a thoughtful gift for chocolate lovers or for any occasion.
